timeline.message:
Data Export Model Changes

Co-authored-by: chandrakaran <chandrakaranreddy.patlolla1@gmail.com>

timeline.author: aklish

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/elide-async/src/main/java/com/yahoo/elide/async/models/ResultFormatType.java b/elide-async/src/main/java/com/yahoo/elide/async/models/ResultFormatType.java
index 59ef3614b..bb2023719 100644
--- a/elide-async/src/main/java/com/yahoo/elide/async/models/ResultFormatType.java
+++ b/elide-async/src/main/java/com/yahoo/elide/async/models/ResultFormatType.java

@@ -11,7 +11,10 @@ import lombok.Getter;
 import java.util.EnumSet;
 import java.util.Set;
 
-
+/**
+ * ENUM of supported result format types.
+ * ex. JSON, CSV etc.
+ */
 public enum ResultFormatType {
     JSONAPI(EnumSet.of(ResultType.EMBEDDED)),
     GRAPHQLAPI(EnumSet.of(ResultType.EMBEDDED)),

timeline.bodyText: Why remove some of these response validations?
timeline.author: aklish
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -203,11 +210,8 @@ public void jsonApiHappyPath1() throws InterruptedException {
                 .statusCode(org.apache.http.HttpStatus.SC_CREATED)
                 .body("data.id", equalTo("edc4a871-dff2-4054-804e-d80075cf830e"))
                 .body("data.type", equalTo("asyncQuery"))
-                .body("data.attributes.status", equalTo("PROCESSING"))

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/elide-integration-tests/src/test/java/com/yahoo/elide/async/integration/tests/AsyncIT.java b/elide-integration-tests/src/test/java/com/yahoo/elide/async/integration/tests/AsyncIT.java
index ff9d08061..99cb24a3a 100644
--- a/elide-integration-tests/src/test/java/com/yahoo/elide/async/integration/tests/AsyncIT.java
+++ b/elide-integration-tests/src/test/java/com/yahoo/elide/async/integration/tests/AsyncIT.java

@@ -210,7 +210,10 @@ public class AsyncIT extends IntegrationTest {
                 .statusCode(org.apache.http.HttpStatus.SC_CREATED)
                 .body("data.id", equalTo("edc4a871-dff2-4054-804e-d80075cf830e"))
                 .body("data.type", equalTo("asyncQuery"))
-                .body("data.attributes.status", notNullValue())
+                .body("data.attributes.status", equalTo("PROCESSING"))
+                .body("data.attributes.result.contentLength", nullValue())
+                .body("data.attributes.result.responseBody", nullValue())
+                .body("data.attributes.result.httpStatus", nullValue())
                 .body("data.attributes.resultType", equalTo(ResultType.EMBEDDED.toString()));
 
         int i = 0;
